dcterms:description: An updated recovery cases data set were collected from Github repository which automatically updates the Covid-19 data in daily cases. The data of the repository is handled by the CSSE (Central for System Science and Engineering) of Johns Hopkins University. The data-sets contain the recovery cases across global as a csv data file between 22 January, 2020 to 27 February, 2021.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 recovery cases dataset

dcterms:creator: Aurélien Géron
dcterms:description: The min-max feature scaling method is used to scale the data in the same platform, normalizing the data between 0 to 1.
dcterms:title: Min-Max feature scaling dataset

dcterms:creator: Sepp Hochreiter
Jürgen Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: The LSTM architecture is used for predicting future trends based on historical data, addressing the vanishing gradient problem in traditional RNNs.
dcterms:title: LSTM architecture reference
